examples: This commands list all static web applications under a subscription.

This command list all builds under a static web app.
Automatically create a new build in static web app When creating a new pull request for branch.
This command lists all existing custom domains for a particular static site.
This command lists the details of the user provided function apps registered with a static site
This command lists continuous webs for an app.
This command lists continuous webs for a deployment slot.
This command lists triggered webs for a deployment slot.
This command list triggered web job's history for a deployment slot.
This command lists triggered webs for an app.
This command lists triggered web job's history for an app.
New-AzAppServiceEnvironment -ResourceGroupName MyResourceGroup -Name MyAseV2 -Location WestEurope -VirtualNetworkName MyVirtualNetwork -SubnetName AseSubnet -LoadBalancerMode Internal

New-AzAppServiceEnvironment -ResourceGroupName MyResourceGroup -Name MyAseV2 -Location WestEurope -VirtualNetworkName MyVirtualNetwork -SubnetName AseSubnet -LoadBalancerMode Internal -SkipRouteTable -SkipNetworkSecurityGroup
This command creates a new static site in an existing resource group, or updates an existing static site.
This command creates or updates the app settings of a static site build.
This command creates or updates the app settings of a static site build.
This command creates or updates the function app settings of a static site.
This command creates or updates the app settings of a static site.
This command creates an invitation link for a user with the role.

$storagePath1 = New-AzWebAppAzureStoragePath -Name "RemoteStorageAccount1" -AccountName "myaccount" -Type AzureFiles -ShareName "someShareName" -AccessKey "some access key" `
-MountPath "\mounts\myFolderInsideTheContainerWebApp"

$storagePath2 = New-AzWebAppAzureStoragePath -Name "RemoteStorageAccount2" -AccountName "myaccount2" -Type AzureFiles -ShareName "someShareName2" -AccessKey "some access key 2" `
-MountPath "\mounts\myFolderInsideTheContainerWebApp2"

Set-AzWebApp -ResourceGroupName myresourcegroup -Name myapp -AzureStoragePath $storagepath1, $storagePath2

This command registers a user provided function app with a static site.
The -FunctionAppRegion is region of the function app.
Get-AzWebAppSlotContinuousWebJob -ResourceGroupName webjob-rg-test -AppName appService-test01 -SlotName slot01 -Name slotcontinuousjob-04 | Remove-AzWebAppSlotContinuousWebJob
Get-AzWebAppSlotTriggeredWebJob -ResourceGroupName webjob-rg-test -AppName appService-test01 -SlotName slot01 -Name slottriggeredjob-04 | Remove-AzWebAppSlotTriggeredWebJob
Restore-AzDeletedWebApp -ResourceGroupName Default-Web-WestUS -Name ContosoApp -Slot Staging -TargetResourceGroupName Default-Web-EastUS -TargetName ContosoRestore -RestoreContentOnly
Get-AzWebAppSlotContinuousWebJob -ResourceGroupName webjob-rg-test -AppName appService-test01 -SlotName slot01 -Name slotcontinuousjob-01 | Start-AzWebAppSlotContinuousWebJob
Get-AzWebAppSlotTriggeredWebJob -ResourceGroupName webjob-rg-test -AppName appService-test01 -SlotName slot01 -Name slottriggeredjob-03 | Start-AzWebAppSlotTriggeredWebJob
Get-AzWebAppSlotContinuousWebJob -ResourceGroupName webjob-rg-test -AppName appService-test01 -SlotName slot01 -Name slotcontinuousjob-01 | Stop-AzWebAppSlotContinuousWebJob
